select
distinct
from operator_log
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into operator_log (operId, title, operator_type, method, channel, operator_url, operator_name, operator_ip, operator_location, operator_param, status, error_msg, operator_time) values (#{operid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
